projects.name: BlockScript
projects.caption:
BlockScript is an easy-to-use visual scripting system that lets anyone create cloud functions and software backends quickly and easily.

Users can build and run cloud functions without the ability to code, automating/ scheduling tasks and integrations with explicit detail and customisation unavailable through other systems.
features: User accounts with sign in from google, github or email
Visual Scripting system with slick drag drop function builder
Complex programming features including support for different data types, reccursion, functional programming, API Calls, etc
Payment/ Premium integration with stripe
Functions with automatic scheduling and triggers run via cloud functions
REST API allowing users to integrate BlockScript functions into their own apps

projects.name: Dashifi
projects.caption:
Dashifi is a slick Dashboard builder for REST API driven dashboards.

The site enables users to create and populate beautiful Dashboards, pushing data and monitoring connections in real time via SignalR.
features: User accounts with sign in from Google and GitHub
Slick Dashboard builder with drag and drop interface
REST API
Postman Collection generated for each Dashboard to assist with integration
Realtime monitoring of connections
Realtime updates of connected Dashboards
Premium features with stripe
BlockScript integration for easy no-code updates
Full Documentation at https://docs.dashifi.app

projects.name: 3Cols
projects.caption:
3Cols is a free cloud-based snippet manager allowing you to share code snippets with a team enabling greater productivity and encouraging reusable code.

The site allows uses to create and organise code snippets and share them freely within their organisations or to other 3Cols users.
features: User accounts with sign in from google
Syntax/ Language highlighting
Sharing system via organisations, individual accounts or public links
VSCode extension powered with the API available on the Visual Studio Marketplace
Full REST API documented at https://3cols.com/docs
.NET Nuget package for API available at https://www.nuget.org/profiles/3Cols
Progressive web app powered by Angular enabling install on desktop/ android
Link/ associate Snippets together
Download full Board content as a zip
SSR with Angular Universal

projects.name: Docs
projects.caption:
The docs project was created as a generic documentation template for other projects such as BlockScript, 3Cols and Dashifi.

This site uses Gulp + Angular Universal to dynamically build markdown pages into prerendered HTML pages, fully automated with GitHub Actions.
features: Prerendering with Angular Universal
Build rendered html pages from markdown files
Automated build pipeline with GitHub Actions
Mobile Friendly
Generic template with reusability for other projects

projects.name: Mosaic Builder
projects.caption:
Mosaic Builder is a truly free, in browser rendered mosaic image generator built using React.

Create unlimited mosaic images with an easy interface allowing for tailoring to your specification.
features: Generate unlimited free mosaic images
Render in browser with no api dependencies
Use multiple images for each mosaic
Colour matching algorithm allowing for the complete removal of the target image
Mobile friendly

projects.name: Webpedia
projects.caption:
(Cocktails) Webpedia is the first of a hopefully evergrowing collection of informative wikis powered by a generic angular project which can load custom configurations.

Find over 600 cocktail recipies on this site for free on our dynamically generated pages
features: Generate dynamic pages from a custom configuration json
Server Side Rendering with angular universal and cloud functions
Omnisearch across pages (cocktails and ingredients)
PWA allowing install on desktop/ android
Mobile friendly

projects.name: RepoBrowser
projects.caption: (Pre GitHub web editor) Repo Browser is the faster and easier way to browse GitHub Repositories in your browser or on your desktop, complete with images, videos, and other media. Repo Browser also includes the ability to compare against previous commits and traverse any branches a repository might have
features: Browse public and private repositories
View and compare commits in each file
Open multiple tabs
Sign in via GitHub to retrieve your own repositories
Display images, videos, and other media

otherProjects.name: ZoomCrasher.app
otherProjects.caption:
Zoom Crasher is a curated collection of Open Zoom meetings collected using the Twitter API. Find free useful classes or just try out some random links.

Powered by an ASP.NET core back-end querying the Twitter API and a decoupled front-end using Firebase.

otherProjects.name: McMurtry Automotive
otherProjects.caption: Created a WPF application to assist with the management and creation of CAD drawings and part files for an innovative automotive company.

otherProjects.name: NeoGamers
otherProjects.caption: Laid the foundation for an E-commerce site for trading game items, complete with PayPal integration and content management system.

otherProjects.name: Loddg
otherProjects.caption: Implemented google maps, restyled header and a number of other components, fixed bugs and improved the performance of their site.

otherProjects.name: IFAPDB
otherProjects.caption:
IFAPDB is a community populated site which aims to provide a service similar to IMDB but specifically tailored to nude scenes in mainstream media. We wrote it from the ground up to include key features such as a full user system with login, profiles and scoring for community contributions which provides users with rewards.

Additionally, IFAPDB is a full-fledged CMS and utilises a reviewing system with comments, replies and ratings. The community accessible content management system features tagging, videos, timings, descriptions, a media/actor search and a fully featured admin section.

Please Note: This site is NSFW.
